Package sharedRegions

Class DepartureAirport

  • java.lang.Object
    • sharedRegions.DepartureAirport
  • public class DepartureAirport
extends java.lang.Object
    Departure Airport. It is responsible to keep a continuously updated account of the passengers in queue. and is implemented using semaphores for synchronization. All public methods are executed in mutual exclusion. There are five internal synchronization points: an array of blocking points, one per each passenger, where they wait to show documents and after to board the plane, one where the pilot awaits for the boarding to end, one where the hostess awaits the next flight to arrive, one where the hostess wait for the passenger to show the documents and a last one where she awaits for a new passenger in queue

    • Method Detail

      • getnINQ

        public int getnINQ()
        Returns:
        number of passengers in queue .

      • endHostess

        public void endHostess()
        Operation for the pilot to unblock the waiting hostess. It is called by a pilot to unlock the hostess thread, so it can terminate.

      • informPlaneReadyForBoarding

        public void informPlaneReadyForBoarding()
        Operation inform that the plane is ready for boarding. It is called by a pilot when the plane is ready for the next boarding.

      • waitForAllInBoard

        public void waitForAllInBoard()
        Operation for the pilot to wait for conclusion of boarding. It is called by a pilot when the hostess informs the plane is ready to take off.

      • parkAtTransferGate

        public void parkAtTransferGate()
        Operation for the pilot to park at the transfer gate. It is called by a pilot when he parks the plane at the transfer gate, .

      • prepareForPassBoarding

        public void prepareForPassBoarding()
        Operation for the hostess to prepare for pass boarding. It is called by a hostess when she prepares to wait for the passengers.

      • checkDocuments

        public int checkDocuments()
        Operation for the hostess to check documents. It is called by a hostess when she is checking the passenger documents.
        Returns:
        id of the passenger

      • waitPilot

        public void waitPilot()
        Operation for the hostess to be locked in the first iteration. It is called by a hostess in the first iteration so shw waits for the plane to be ready for boarding.

      • waitForNextPassenger

        public boolean waitForNextPassenger​(int passengerID)
        Operation for the hostess to wait for a new passenger. It is called by a hostess when she waits for a new passenger.
        Parameters:
        passengerID - id of passenger
        Returns:
        true if the plane is ready to fly, false otherwise

      • informPlaneReadyToTakeOff

        public void informPlaneReadyToTakeOff()
        Operation for the hostess to inform the plane is ready to flight. It is called by a hostess after the plane gets ready to leave.

      • waitForNextFlight

        public void waitForNextFlight()
        Operation for the hostess to wait for the next flight. It is called by a hostess while she is waiting for the next flight.

      • waitInQueue

        public void waitInQueue()
        Operation for the passenger to go to the waiting queue. It is called by a passenger after going to the airport.

      • showDocuments

        public void showDocuments()
        Operation for the passenger to show his/her documents to the hostess. It is called by a passenger showing his/her documents to teh hostess.
